wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.

item.title: Welcome to Franklin
item.dc:creator: ericnicolaas
item.content:encoded:
Franklin is a WordPress crowdfunding theme for single-campaign websites. Created with a mobile first approach, it is 100% responsive and features crisp retina graphics. Looking to crowdfund your band’s next album? Your non-profit’s next major project? Your invention? Franklin can help you do it in style while cutting out the middle man.

item.title: It's Hard to be Humble When You're from Alabama
item.dc:creator: ericnicolaas
item.content:encoded:
[embed]http://vimeo.com/13543830[/embed]
An excellent tune by Phosphorescent, from his album "Here's to Taking it Easy".

item.title: Jetpack integration
item.dc:creator: ericnicolaas
item.content:encoded: Besides showing off some random beauties found on Flickr Commons, this post demonstrates Cheers' integration with Jetpack's Tiled Gallery and Lightbox Carousel modules. [gallery type="rectangular" ids="64,63,62,61,55,54" orderby="rand"]

item.title: Roald Dahl
item.dc:creator: ericnicolaas
item.content:encoded: A person who has good thoughts cannot ever be ugly. You can have a wonky nose and a crooked mouth and a double chin and stick-out teeth, but if you have good thoughts they will shine out of your face like sunbeams and you will always look lovely.

item.title: Five custom widgets
item.dc:creator: ericnicolaas
item.content:encoded: One of the nice things about Franklin is that it comes bundled with five custom widgets: Campaign Video, Campaign Updates, Campaign Pledge Levels, Campaign Backers and Sofa Posts Widget.
